welcome_message_body: Welcome to Katy, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Katy has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Houston Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at West Houston Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport offers exclusive services for private aircraft owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
